# Week 8: Modeling and Ethics of Environmental Interventions

- Mon: Assumptions, biases, and ethical implications of models used to justify environmental interventions
- Tue: Build contrasting models (e.g., conservation vs. development outcomes)
- Wed: Group design: simulate environmental policy scenarios (e.g., cap-and-trade vs. carbon tax)
- Thu: Role Play: Stakeholder debate over an environmental modeling-based policy decision
- Fri: Build model summary dashboards (RMarkdown / Shiny preview)** Build model summary dashboards (RMarkdown / Shiny preview)

Explore reproducibility and documentation using LLMs (e.g., RMarkdown, code comments)
